line.words: At one o’clock he met Hernandez the quick black kangaroo. Hector noticed Hernandez quickly hide something in his pouch.

line.words: “What time is it Hernandez?” asked Hector. “One o‘clock,” replied Hernandez in his smooth, furry voice.

line.words: “How old are you?” the kangaroo enquired. “I am eight years old. I have a brother who is four years old, and a sister who is ten.”

line.words: “And you?” asked Hector. “I live with Penelope, the red rooster and Benito, the orange cuckoo. We live in a burrow next to the river.”
